markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">[Dust Storm](/Spells.aspx?ID=603)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Nonlethal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=188" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 114 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Dust](/Domains.aspx?ID=44)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Area** 20-foot-radius burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You call forth a swirling storm of dust. The _dust storm_ obscures vision, with the effect of [_obscuring mist_](/Spells.aspx?ID=210). The dust also makes the air unbreathable; creatures in the area must [hold their breath](/Rules.aspx?ID=468), though wearing a scarf or similar clothing over the mouth increases the time the creature can hold its breath to 5 rounds. Creatures entering or starting their turn in the _dust storm_ take 1d6 slashing damage. Creatures that have the [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165) trait or that are made primarily of liquid take double damage.

---
**Heightened (+2)** The damage increases by 1d6.
name: Dust Storm

text: Dust Storm Source Gods & Magic pg. 114 2.0 Domain Dust Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range 120 feet Area 20-foot-radius burst Duration 1 minute --- You call forth a swirling storm of dust. The dust storm obscures vision, with the effect of obscuring mist . The dust also makes the air unbreathable; creatures in the area must hold their breath, though wearing a scarf or similar clothing over the mouth increases the time the creature can hold its breath to 5 rounds. Creatures entering or starting their turn in the dust storm take 1d6 slashing damage. Creatures that have the water trait or that are made primarily of liquid take double damage. --- Heightened (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.
